did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Correspondence, financial accounts, tax lists, and school census reports chiefly related to the Treasurer of Pinal County. Includes assessments of county taxes for the Silver King Mining Company; school census reports for Mammoth, Ariz., 1876-1891, and other districts, 1906-1907; as well as tax lists for poll, property, license, delinquent, territorial, and county taxes.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

The user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Arizona Board of Regents for the University of Arizona, its officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims made by any person asserting that he or she is an owner of copyright.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Pinal County, Arizona records (AZ 128). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Pinal County was formed in 1875 from portions of Pima, Maricopa, and Yavapai Counties.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, financial accounts, tax lists, and school census reports chiefly related to the Treasurer of Pinal County. Includes assessments of county taxes for the Silver King Mining Company; school census reports for Mammoth, Ariz., 1876-1891, and other districts, 1906-1907; as well as tax lists for poll, property, license, delinquent, territorial, and county taxes.

did.unittitle:
Board of Supervisors, Sheriff, Treasurer, Superintendent of Public Schools.
1875-1905

scopecontent.p:
Includes:
Board of Supervisors: Receipts issued to County Treasurer for various territorial and county funds, 1881-1888 and 1891-1892.
Delinquent Taxes: Delinquent tax roll, statement of delinquent taxes collected, etc., 1876-1877, 1882-1885, 1891.
Henderson, D., banker: Record of Pinal County warants handled by D. Henderson, 1884-1886.
Letters between Treasurer and Superintendent of Public Schools relating to school apportionments, 1889, 1891-1893.
Sheriff: Monthly report of license tax collected, 1876-1879, 1881-1883, 1891.
Sheriff: Receipts-License tax, tax roll, delinquent tax roll, 1875-1879, 1881-1882, 1892.
Sheriff/Tax Collector/Assessor: Report of territorial and county taxes collected, 1879-1884, 1892.
Superintendent of Public Schools: Warrants, 1875-1876.
Taxes: Miscellaneous papers, 1878, 1893, 1895.
Treasurer: Annual statement showing receipts and disbursements of the school fund, 1883-1885.
Treasurer: Correspondence, 1875-1892.
Treasurer/Tax Collector: Correspondence, 1904-1905.
Treasurer: Miscellaneous papers-Affidavits and receipts, notices of property sales, etc., 1883-1886.
Territorial Treasurer: Receipts for various funds from Pinal County and correspondence, 1876-1879, 1881-1882.
Miscellaneous Receipts, 1879, 1881.

did.unittitle: Tax Assessment Roll (also includes quarterly tax roll of net proceeds of mines) 1876,1878,1880

scopecontent.p:
Includes:
Monthly Account of the Treasurer with Pinal County, 1900-1901.
Quarterly Account of the Treasurer with Pinal County, 1876-1901.
Assessment returns to the Territorial Auditor, 1883, 1885, 1886.
Statement of disbursements from the treasury, 1889.
Statement of receipts into the treasury, 1889-1892.
Statement of receipts into the treasury, 1875-1882.
